title: Food I Like
description: A person talks about their favorite foods
transcript: I like food very much! For breakfast, I eat bread and cheese. I drink orange juice. For lunch, I have rice and chicken. It is delicious. For dinner, I eat soup and salad. My favorite food is pizza. I love pizza with cheese and tomatoes. I also like ice cream. Chocolate ice cream is the best! I don't like fish very much.
